articles.title: U.S. DOW announces Boeing awarded $2.044B task order for B-52 CERP
articles.mainIdea: U.S. DOW announces Boeing awarded $2.044B task order for B-52 CERP
articles.summary: TipRanks: U.S. DOW announces Boeing awarded $2.044B task order for B-52 CERP. The U.S. Department of War, DOW, announced Boeing (BA) Defense Systems was awarded a $2,044,005,063 task order, for B-52 Commercial Engine Replacement Program, CERP, Post-Critical Design Review, PCDR, Development. The task order progresses the B-52 CERP program by completing system integration activities after Critical Design Review and modifying and testing two B-52 aircraft with new engines and associated subsystems. articles.title: Armandino Batali, Seattle Chef Who Turned to Salami After Working at Boeing, Dies at 88
articles.mainIdea: Armandino Batali, Seattle Chef Who Turned to Salami After Working at Boeing, Dies at 88
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Armandino Batali, Seattle Chef Who Turned to Salami After Working at Boeing, Dies at 88. Father of famed chef Mario Batali, Armandino created a national destination for cured meats in a hole-in-the-wall deli in Seattle. Related tickers mentioned: SBUX.

articles.title: Airbus Secures Contract to Supply 100 Military Helicopters to Spain
articles.mainIdea: Airbus Secures Contract to Supply 100 Military Helicopters to Spain
articles.summary: Zacks: Airbus Secures Contract to Supply 100 Military Helicopters to Spain. EADSY wins Spain's largest helicopter procurement, agreeing to supply 100 military aircraft across four models to modernize the nation's armed forces. Related tickers mentioned: EADSF, EADSY, LMT, TXT.
